title: if the building is proposed on any area filled up with carcasses, excreta, and filthy and offensive
clause_text: if the building is proposed on any area filled up with carcasses, excreta, and filthy and offensive matter, till the production of a certificate from the Commissioner to the effect that it is hygienically fit to be built upon;

source_pdf.text_snippet: if the building is proposed on any area filled up with carcasses, excreta, and filthy and offensive matter, till the production of a certificate from the Commissioner to the effect that it is hygienic
